gov.usgs.anss.util

Class FormUDP

  • java.lang.Object
    • gov.usgs.anss.util.FormUDP

  • public final class FormUDP
extends java.lang.Object
    FormUDP.java - This class allows communications of tag-value pairs over a TCP/IP socket to the VMS systems. This system is used to update the VMS Form file to reflect the database settings on the Anss system. This allows automatic syncing of the Anss database to the form file. The "port" of the created object indicates the form file type on VMS (a separate listener for each file type is created on the VMS side). Created on December 5, 2003, 11:42 AM

    • Constructor Detail

      • FormUDP

        public FormUDP(int port,
               java.lang.String host,
               java.lang.String station)
        Creates a new instance of UdpServer
        Parameters:
        port - The integer port number of the VMS system to contact- determines which file or system will be update
        host - The host name of the VMS system which must be resolvable by DNS to IP adr
        station - The key of the record in the Form file on VMS (which record will be updated)
